text: Visar Berisha (born 7 December 1986) is a Kosovan professional footballer who plays as a centre-back and captains the Kosovan club Ballkani. ==International career== ===Albania=== Berisha was expected to be called up by the Albania national team after his good performances with Schaffhausen, but due to the rupture of the ligaments of his right knee, he lost the chance to be called up from Albania, but also to be transferred to Swiss club Grasshoppers. ===Kosovo=== On 22 January 2018, Berisha received a call-up from Kosovo for the friendly match against Azerbaijan. However, the match was cancelled and therefore he was unable to make his debut. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:People from Suva Reka Category:Kosovan footballers Category:Kosovan expatriate footballers Category:Kosovan expatriate sportspeople in Switzerland Category:Association football central defenders Category:Football Superleague of Kosovo players Category:FC Prishtina players Category:KF Ballkani players Category:KF Liria players Category:KF Drenica players Category:Swiss Challenge League players Category:FC Winterthur players Category:FC Schaffhausen players
title: Visar Berisha
